t: Amazon Brand Registry: Protect your brand in Italy
s: Start your brand's Amazon journey by enrolling it in Amazon Brand Registry for free. After enrolling, you'll be able to unlock a suite of brand-building tools and obtain various protection benefits. You can enrol your brand even if you don't sell in an Amazon store.

t: Brand+ and Performance+ Now Available in Amazon DSP Globally | Amazon Ads
s: March 21, 2025 - From a campaign management perspective, by automating the traditional 70-step campaign creation process, Brand+ and Performance+ reduce complexity and provide real-time reporting and AI-driven optimizations, enabling brands to stay competitive and drive better business results.

t: BASDEHEN Brand Kitchen Faucets Recalled Due to Dangerous Lead Exposure for Young Children; Sold on Amazon.com by Chenfeng Store | CPSC.gov
s: Consumers should immediately stop using these faucets and contact Chenfeng Store about disposal and a refund. Consumers will need to provide a photograph of disposal to receive the refund. Amazon is contacting all known purchasers directly.Until these faucets can be replaced, consumers should ...

t: CPSC Warns Consumers to Immediately Stop Using CEINOL Brand Bathroom Faucets Sold on Amazon.com Due to Dangerous Lead Exposure for Young Children | CPSC.gov

t: KICIMPRO Brand Kitchen Faucets Recalled Due to Dangerous Lead Exposure for Young Children; Sold on Amazon.com by Kicimpro | CPSC.gov

t: Brand Stores: crea gratuitamente una pagina del brand su Amazon | Amazon Ads
